exp.libs.sock.socket.nio.common.filter

Class SensitiveFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • exp.libs.sock.socket.nio.common.filterchain.impl.BaseFilter
      • exp.libs.sock.socket.nio.common.filter.SensitiveFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFilter

    public class SensitiveFilter
extends BaseFilter
     敏感词过滤器
 
 当消息触犯敏感词规则时过滤。
 若达到触犯敏感词规则的上限，则断开会话。
 此过滤器暂时只能针对String类型的msg处理。

    PROJECT : exp-libs
    SUPPORT : https://exp-blog.com
    Since:
    JDK 1.8+
    Version:
    2022-03-06
    Author:
    EXP: exp.lqb@foxmail.com

      • SensitiveFilter

        public SensitiveFilter(List<String> sensitiveRules,
                       int maxSensitiveNum)
        构造函数
        Parameters:
        sensitiveRules - 过滤规则
        maxSensitiveNum - 允许触犯敏感规则的次数，超过则强制关闭会话，-1表示不限制触犯次数
